item.title: Goal Setting 1001
item.description: Reflections on my experience with the 101 in 1001 goal-setting format. I found that the format was not realistic for my life as a mom of three small children with limited free time. As a busy mom, I struggled to find time for myself amidst child care, homeschooling, laundry, grocery shopping, cleaning, and other daily tasks. I’m now on the hunt for a more flexible goal-setting method that works better for my busy schedule.
